PSCT.Base: You can target 1 monster you control and 1 card on the field; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, destroy them. If this card is sent from the field to your GY: You can target 1 other monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then add 1 Level 1 Plant monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Sauge de Fleur" once per turn.
